publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-985.1 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Nursery Nurses, A Just Claimâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-985) in the name of Carolyn Leckie, leave out from "agrees" to end and insert "supports local pay bargaining; welcomes the settlement by nine local authorities, but calls on UNISON to make a special dispensation for children who have special educational needs due to the severe impact that the strike has on them and their families."
